Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Specimen Type(s): Enriched Lim broth cultures from vaginal/rectal swabs
Specimen Container(s): Equivalent swab in non-nutritive transport medium
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert GBS LB XC test, a qualitative automated PCR assay for detection of Group B Streptococcus DNA from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens using the GeneXpert platform.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated qualitative in vitro diagnostic test to detect Group B Streptococcus DNA from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens, aiding in determining GBS colonization status of antepartum women.
